meanings.definition: Under the terms or provisions stated below.
meanings.sent1: Please sign your name hereunder the agreement.
meanings.sent2: The instructions for assembly are provided hereunder.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to nap hereunder the warm sunbeam.
meanings.sent4: The roots of the tree spread far and wide, reaching hereunder the ground.
meanings.sent5: The treasure was hidden hereunder the old oak tree, waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: In the following part of a document or text.
meanings.sent1: The details of the case are outlined hereunder.
meanings.sent2: Please refer to the section hereunder for more information.
meanings.sent3: The recipe for the delicious cake was found hereunder the dessert section.
meanings.sent4: Her name was mentioned hereunder the list of winners.
meanings.sent5: The key points are summarized hereunder, making it easy to understand.
